Articles.Content:
I am going to try and make weapons from sci-fi movies

I dont have much experience with modeling or coding but I am going to try to make the best of it

I am going to release the first one As soon as possible.

I hope to start with the AT-AT gun

If you have suggestions about what weapons I should make, please say so

Edited October 26, 2015 by 129828
I have to mention, I am not good at moddeling, I hope to get better, the first release will have to week a few days
